name: HerpesTestsForHerpesSimplexVirusByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: Herpes (Tests for Herpes simplex virus by Culture and Identification Method)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Herpes simplex virus by Culture and Identification Method),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Herpes simplex),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
